import React, { useContext } from 'react' import {fContext} from './Home' export default function Product(){ const [product,dispatch] = useContext(fContext) return (

ref : {product.ref}

name : {product.name}

categorie : {product.cat}

prix : {product.prix}

quanity : {product.qt}

Delete(product)}> Delete
) }
